attributes.additional_details:
Because we are paying the highest tax ever and government just keep giving it away. If you can give our money away to other countries then we’re obviously paying too much tax.
Because our pensioners have one of the lowest pensions in the world.
attributes.background: Stop sending tax payers money abroad until we are completely out of debt.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition: 

Stop all foreign aid: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700263
